<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Vargouille](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2477)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Beast" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=20" />
<trait label="Fiend" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=70" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace](/Sources.aspx?ID=45) pg. 35, [Crown of the Kobold King](/Sources.aspx?ID=148) pg. 124

**Perception** +11; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +4

**Int** -2

**Wis** +3

**Cha** -1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +7 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 30

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** fly 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +10 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d8+3 piercing plus vargouille venom

**Kiss** <actions string="Single Action" />  The vargouille kisses an adjacent creature that's asleep, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), or [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38), exposing it to the vargouille transformation disease.

**Shriek** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) The vargouille shrieks, its scream so terrible that all non-vargouilles within 60 feet must succeed at a DC 16 Fortitude save or be [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28) for 3 rounds. The effect ends early for a creature if the vargouille moves out of sight, moves farther than 60 feet from the creature, or attacks the creature with its fangs. After attempting its save, a creature is immune to that particular vargouille's Shriek for 24 hours.

**Vargouille Transformation**  ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) Exposing the victim to sunlight or any [light](/Traits.aspx?ID=100) spell of 3rd level or higher pauses the progression of the disease until the victim is no longer in light. **Saving Throw** DC 18 Fortitude; **Stage 1** carrier with no effect (1d6 hours); **Stage 2** victim's hair falls out (1d6 hours); **Stage 3** victim's ears grow into leathery wings, tentacles sprout on the chin and scalp, and the teeth become long, pointed fangs (1 day); **Stage 4** victim's mind regresses to a vicious and unintelligent shell of its former self (1d6 hours); **Stage 5** victim's head breaks free of the body (which dies) and becomes a new vargouille

**Vargouille Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 18 Fortitude; **Stage 1** Damage the victim has taken from vargouille fangs can't be healed magically. Once all vargouille fang damage has been healed nonmagically, the poison ends.

</column>
